name: Phi Bold Blade 16pins 50pcs
short_description: Phi Bold Blade is a 16 pin extremely precise blade with needles arranged in a unique shape, which makes it the perfect go-to needle for natural like strokes with various styles.
long_description: What makes this blade unique?Its specially designed pointed tips crafted for creating micro-precision strokes, sharpened to highest precision and with dual action. The blade is composed of two sides which multiplies the number of looks you can create. Use the longer side of the blade to create normal strokes and the short side for achieving very short connected strokes. While using the blade switch sides for creating the desired strokes and combine both different effects into one flawless look.
